artifacts.title: System Instruction
artifacts.content: You are a support assistant. Follow safety and company policy.

artifacts.title: Policy
artifacts.content: Do not provide account numbers. Escalate billing disputes.

artifacts.title: History 1
artifacts.content: User: I need help with my bill.

artifacts.title: History 2
artifacts.content: Assistant: Sure, can you share your account number?
